Package net.nergi.misc.objects

Class GameItem

Object
GameItem
public final class GameItem
extends Object
Immutable class that holds information about about a generic item that would be in a game. Uses factory methods to create items without consuming too much memory.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean equals​(Object o)
    A GameItem is only equal to another object iff the object is another GameItem and the name and description matches.
    String getDescription()
    Get item description.
    String getName()
    Get item name.
    int hashCode()
    Get item hash using default hashing algorithm.
    static GameItem makeItem​(String name, String description)
    Create a new game item with the given name and description.
    String toString()
    Gets a string representation of the current item.

    Methods inherited from class Object

    clone, finalize, getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
